players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie, why did you remain silent? We need to hear from everyone to find the mafia."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Bob: "I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote Alice!"
You: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. I have proof he is mafia. Vote Bob!"
